body_html:
Hi,
This is documented incorrectly. The quantile function can exist but would require some implementation of something like this: http://reference.wolfram.com/language/ref/InverseGammaRegularized.html.

The issue here is that all these public methods exist on distributions (which call private methods), and hence docstrings always exist (even though the private methods might not be implemented).

body:
Hi,
  This is documented incorrectly. The quantile function can exist but would require some implementation of something like this: http://reference.wolfram.com/language/ref/InverseGammaRegularized.html.

The issue here is that all these public methods exist on distributions (which call private methods), and hence docstrings always exist (even though the private methods might not be implemented).
